languages.text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: In dialogues, book events, and on the ability bar, you can signal other players by using <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">. For other objects, such as enemies, NPCs, planets, and more, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight text lines in dialogues and book events or abilities on the abilities panel to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or planets on a system map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

languages.text: Нажатием <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> вы можете подсвечивать способности и расходные предметы на панели в нижней части экрана или выборы в диалогах и книжных событиях, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или объекты на карте, используйте ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: Нажатием <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> вы можете подсвечивать строки в диалогах или книжных событиях или способности на панели способностей, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или планеты на карте системы, используйте ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

Нажатием <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> вы можете подсвечивать строки в диалогах или книжных событиях или способности на панели способностей, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или планеты на карте системы, используйте ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

languages.text: Puedes pulsar <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> para resaltar capacidades y consumibles en el panel de la zona inferior de la pantalla u opciones de diálogo y eventos de libro para indicar al resto del grupo qué opción prefieres. Para otros elementos, como las casillas del campo de batalla, modelos de criatura o elementos del mapa, pulsa ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: Puedes pulsar <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> para resaltar capacidades y consumibles en el panel de la zona inferior de la pantalla u opciones de diálogo y eventos de libro para indicar al resto del grupo qué opción prefieres. Para otros elementos, como las casillas del campo de batalla, modelos de criatura o elementos del mapa, pulsa ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

languages.text: <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">を押すと、画面下部のパネルに表示されるアビリティや消耗品、またはダイアログや書物イベントの選択肢をハイライトして、他のグループメンバーに選びたい選択肢を示すことが可能です。戦場のセルやクリーチャーそのもの、マップ上にあるオブジェクトなどその他のオブジェクトはALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">でハイライトできます。
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">を押すと、画面下部のパネルに表示されるアビリティや消耗品、またはダイアログや書物イベントの選択肢をハイライトして、他のグループメンバーに選びたい選択肢を示すことが可能です。戦場のセルやクリーチャーそのもの、マップ上にあるオブジェクトなどその他のオブジェクトはALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">でハイライトできます。

languages.text: 您可以按下<sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">，在屏幕底部的面板上高亮显示能力与消耗品，或是在对话与文本事件期间高亮标记文本行，让其他玩家看到您想要选择的选项。若要高亮显示其他物体，如战场上的格子、目标生物，或地图上的物品，请按下ALT+<sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">进行选择。
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: 您可以按下<sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">，在屏幕底部的面板上高亮显示能力与消耗品，或是在对话与文本事件期间高亮标记文本行，让其他玩家看到您想要选择的选项。若要高亮显示其他物体，如战场上的格子、目标生物，或地图上的物品，请按下ALT+<sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">进行选择。

languages.text: Drücke <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">, um Fähigkeiten und Verbrauchsgegenstände oder Entscheidungen in Dialogen oder Buchereignissen am unteren Bildschirmrand zu markieren, um anderen Gruppenmitgliedern zu zeigen, mit welcher Option du fortfahren möchtest. Mit ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> kannst du andere Objekte wie Zellen auf dem Schlachtfeld, Kreaturenmodelle oder Objekte auf der Karte markieren.
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: Drücke <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">, um Fähigkeiten und Verbrauchsgegenstände oder Entscheidungen in Dialogen oder Buchereignissen am unteren Bildschirmrand zu markieren, um anderen Gruppenmitgliedern zu zeigen, mit welcher Option du fortfahren möchtest. Mit ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> kannst du andere Objekte wie Zellen auf dem Schlachtfeld, Kreaturenmodelle oder Objekte auf der Karte markieren.

languages.text: Appuyez sur <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

traits.locale_text: Appuyez sur <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

Appuyez sur <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.

languages.text: Ekranın altında bulunan paneldeki kabiliyet ve sarf eşyaları vurgulu göstermek ya da diyalog ve kitap sekanslarında hangi seçeneği seçmek istediğini diğer grup üyelerine belirtmek için <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> tuşuna basabilirsin. Çatışma alanındaki hücreler, yaratık modelleri veya haritadaki nesneler gibi diğer nesneler için ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> tuşlarını kullan.
languages.original_text: You can press <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN"> to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use ALT + <sprite name="UI_LeftMouseBTN">.
